List all assets

Boombox packages all of its static assets in a easy to transport/query format, you can get a list of everything by going to /.internals/asset-list.

That page is generated dynamic from items that are stored within a give cassette and you can inspect all of them. This includes all server-side code (see codebase/*).

Theme by: https://thomasf.github.io/solarized-css/
